name: cognitest
description: AI-Powered Testing Platform - Start everything with one command!

scripts.status: npm run status:services && npm run status:databases
scripts.status:services: echo 'ðŸ” Service Status:' && (lsof -ti:8000 > /dev/null && echo 'âœ… Backend (8000) - Running' || echo 'âŒ Backend (8000) - Stopped') && (lsof -ti:3000 > /dev/null && echo 'âœ… Frontend (3000) - Running' || echo 'âŒ Frontend (3000) - Stopped')
scripts.status:databases: echo '' && echo 'ðŸ“Š Database Status:' && (pg_isready -h localhost > /dev/null 2>&1 && echo 'âœ… PostgreSQL - Running' || echo 'âŒ PostgreSQL - Stopped') && (redis-cli ping > /dev/null 2>&1 && echo 'âœ… Redis - Running' || echo 'âŒ Redis - Stopped') && (lsof -ti:6333 > /dev/null 2>&1 && echo 'âœ… Qdrant (6333) - Running' || echo 'âšª Qdrant - Stopped (optional)')
scripts.health: echo 'ðŸ¥ Health Check:' && curl -s http://localhost:8000/health || echo 'âŒ Backend unhealthy'
scripts.logs:frontend: tail -f frontend/.next/trace 2>/dev/null || echo 'No frontend logs found'
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && . venv/bin/activate && alembic upgrade head
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && . venv/bin/activate && alembic downgrade base && alembic upgrade head
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:migrate
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:backend: cd backend && python3 -m venv venv && . venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.celery: cd backend && . venv/bin/activate && celery -A app.celery_app worker --loglevel=info
scripts.test: echo 'ðŸ§ª Running tests...' && npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && rm -rf __pycache__ .pytest_cache && find . -type d -name '__pycache__' -exec rm -rf {} +
